doc.title: 2 on U
doc.plot: Best friends Ava Knight and Gea Roth are two single women determined to realize the Hollywood dream. Gradually, their struggle gives way to frustration and uncertainty as they realize the search for their big acting break has taken a toll on them, both personally and professionally. While they hone their skills and inch toward success, they find genuine love and companionship has eluded them. They know something has to change soon.
